product_name: Tecnica Mach 1 130 C.A.S Ski Boots - Men's - 2014/2015
long_description: A performance boot for hardcore skiers looking for a traditional 4-buckle closure and incredible responsiveness, the Mach 1 130 C. A.S. boots offer a 100mm footbed and a great fit.
short_description: A performance boot for hardcore skiers looking for a traditional 4-buckle closure and incredible responsiveness, the Mach 1 130 C. A.S. boots offer a 100mm footbed and a great fit.
